ygData.subject: Hi everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: I wanted to say hi and that I just started an Enchanter. I was wondering if I could get some advice from all of you out there. I m Erudian, but I am hunting
ygData.messageBody:
I wanted to say hi and that I just started an Enchanter. I was wondering if
I could get some advice from all of you out there. I'm Erudian, but I am
hunting with a friend in Qeynos Hills right now, I'm 4th level. I really
don't know what I'm doing, usually here is what combat is like, I haven't
been lucky enough to get in a group yet.

1. Summon and Buff Pet
2. Tashan
3. Suffacating Sphere
4. Enfeeblement
5. Watch Animation beat up critter, sometimes help.
6. Run away recast Animation and help finish it off.

Those are pretty much all the spells I use, with the exception of Minor
Guard, Haze and Strengthen.

I have found that the best exp for me is to kill the diseased stuff and turn
in thier pelts for alot of exp and a cure of course, that's really nice. I
turned in a fleshy orb once, but she handed it back and said to go to
Freeport, though I have no idea where that is.

Are there any problems with what I'm doing? Please give me any advice you
can, I would love to hear it, I don't wanna get stuck in a way of doing
things only to find out that it will be wrong when I get higher in levels.

PS: Where in Qeynos do I buy The daggers for the Animation spells? I lookf
for hours, and go very lost.
